criteria.name: Proper Markdown link formatting
criteria.description: All links must be properly formatted as [TEXT](URL)

criteria.name: Summary sentence under 32 characters
criteria.description: The summary sentence must be less than 32 characters

criteria.name: No dates appended to URLs
criteria.description: URLs must not have arbitrary dates appended

output:

**MCP is becoming a universal plugin system for everything.** [WORKS ON MY MACHINE ARTICLE](https://worksonmymachine.ai/p/mcp-an-accidentally-universal-plugin)

**MCP: The accidentally universal plugin system** [WORKS ON MY MACHINE ARTICLE](https://worksonmymachine.ai/p/mcp-an-accidentally-universal-plugin)

- MCP servers built for AI silently turn into plugins for any app
- The protocol's power is treating "functionality" like USB treats power and data
- NFT base64 analogy reframes pointers as payloads, layers into one
- One Spotify MCP server unlocks playlists in unrelated apps without coordination
- APM uses MCP for all plugins, from spellcheck to coffee to Warcraft peons
